entities.description: Indicates if a survey respondent would smoke a cigarette if offered by a best friend.
Reflects the respondent's expectation of smoking a cigarette within the next 12 months.
Indicates the number of students in respondent's grade who smoke cigarettes.
Indicates the number of students in respondent's grade who use marijuana or any cannabis product.

relationships.description: The response of the survey participant when offered a cigarette by a close friend.
The expectation of the respondent regarding smoking in the next 12 months.
The respondent's knowledge of cigarette smoking prevalence among peers in the same grade.
The respondent's knowledge of marijuana use prevalence among peers in the same grade.
